733252f-a.title: Squatters Colony at the Hudson River.
733252f-a.folder: 181st Street and Riverside Drive, Manhattan, N.Y.

722852f-a.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 181st Street
722852f-a.text:
Riverside Drive, east side, north of Plaza Lafayette, (181st Street,)
showing a frame house.
September 29, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

722851f-a.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 181st Street
722851f-a.text:
Riverside Drive, north from but not including Plasa Lafavette (West
181st Street). On the extreme right appear the stone wall and ornamental
columns of the estate of Dr. Charles V. Paterno, which has its entrance
on Northern Ave. This wall was built in about 1920. There is a capacious
residence built on the stvle of an ancient Italian castle and many green-
houses, which the doctor maintains as a hobby.
December 28, 1934.
Irving Fitterman.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

722853f-a.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 181st Street
722853f-a.text:
Riverside Drive, south from but not including 181st Street, showing
Plaza Lafayette.
June 3, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

722854f-b.title: Manhattan: Riverside Drive - 181st Street (West)
722854f-b.text:
Riverside Drive, north from a point to the north of W. 181st
Street showing this sweepirg thoroughfare skirting the North
(Hudson) River. At the right is an inclined roadway (Riverside
Terrace) that leads to the apartment house section, known as
Mashington Heiohts and from which the new George Washtngton Bridge
projects across the river to New Jersey. The enbanked colonnade
form a portion of Dr. Chas. V. Paterno's estate and same will rerain
after demolition in 1938 of this individuals castle-like home.
He being a real-estate operator will improve this site with a series
of modern oarden apartments, similar to his Hudson :ie w Gardens of
the same vicinity. View ' is a vista fromm the pergola during the
aforementioned operation. For additional views taken during this
construction period, see, files under Cabrini Boulevard ( a new name
for Northern Averue since 1938).
June 3, 19E4
Views 1 and 2
VieW ': Aueat 23, 1938.
P.L. Snerr
.O REPRODUTTINS.
